Package simple.util

Class Summary
AbstractOptions How to use: Set the default options, AbstractOptions.DEFAULTS, using either the instance block or the static block.
ArrayEnumerator<E> Takes an Object array and creates an enumerator from it.
ArrayIterator<E> Takes an Object array and creates an iterator.
BitArray This handles bits of various sizes in a boolean array.
The array size is set when made and cannot grow or shrink.
BlockingDeque<E> Blocks until the list has an item.
BlockingQueue<E> Blocks until the list has an item.
BlockingStack<E> Blocks until the list has an item.
CIHashtable<V> Hashtable that uses case insensitive keys.
ClassExplorer Slightly simplifies the exploration of a class.
do_array Contains useful functions pertaining to just about anything that is related to or backed by an array.
do_gui Deprecated. See description for replacement classes
do_io Does various IO things.
do_io.StreamJob  
do_io.WriterJob  
do_math
Created: 2006
do_net
Created: Jun 19, 2008
do_sort depends on do_array
Created: Feb 13, 2008
do_str depends on simple.util.do_sort(do_array) Does various things for formatting and comparing Strings.
do_str.CI All methods are case insensitive.
FileLoader A SwingWorker to load files in the background.
HexUtil
Created: 2006
MVHashtable<K,V> Allows multiple values to be stored for each key.
NetUtils This class is still in its infancy.
Queue<E> Provides a Last in Last Out stack.
Stack<E> FILO queue
Created: Feb 20, 2008
StaticDebug Deprecated.  
Time Time conversions.
UrlUtil Depends on simple.util.HexUtil, simple.util.do_str
Created: 2005
Utils (No dependents)
Created: Jan 27, 2009
Utils.Timer This class is used to measure time differences.
Utils.TimerGroup Simple class to maintain several timers at once.
